column4: I dont know what I did but I moved my mouse to the upper left corner and then my screen showed 2 desktops and I was able to move to that one and click on it and then back then I rebooted and I cant do it anymore.. I dont know what I did to get that type of display anyone have an idea
I just typoe scroll to get it to do that again?
I dont even know how I did it in the 1st place
Use the scroll button on your mouse scroll back and forth to change workspaces.
